div.t-attf-class: pb-2 pt-3 #{'card-header bg-white' if report_type == 'html' else ''}

div.t-if: sale_order.transaction_ids and not invoices and sale_order.state in ('sent', 'sale') and portal_confirmation == 'pay' and not success and not error

t.t-value: [i for i in sale_order.invoice_ids if i.state not in ['draft', 'cancel']]
True in [line.discount > 0 for line in sale_order.order_line]

tr.t-att-class: 'bg-200 font-weight-bold o_line_section' if line.display_type == 'line_section' else 'font-italic o_line_note' if line.display_type == 'line_note' else ''

div.t-attf-class: #{'col-3' if report_type != 'html' else 'col-sm-7 col-md-4'} ml-auto text-center

t.t-if: success and (not error and not warning)

i.class: fa fa-circle-o-notch fa-spin fa-2x fa-fw text-black-50

input.name: name
input.title: Contact Name should only letters. e.g. john

input.name: mobile
input.title: Mobile should only Numbers and length 10 digits . e.g. 9876543210

input.name: site_name
input.t-att-value: address.sitename_id.name if address and address.sitename_id else ''

input.name: zip
input.title: Zip Code should only Numbers and length 6 digits . e.g. 500085

div.p: Edit Login name and mobile number
Track the status of your order

div.class: fontsize14 bs-uppercase fontsize10 bs-absolute addres-default white
fontsize14 bs-uppercase fontsize10 bs-absolute addres-default white

button.class: btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold w-100 bs-block
btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold w-100 bs-block
btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold w-100 bs-block
btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold pull-right change-password-btn
btn btn-primary fontsize14 latobold pull-right submit-password-btn

img.t-att-alt: 'Buy ' + wish[0].product_tmpl_id.name + ' Online at Best Price - buildmart'
'Buy ' + wish[0].product_tmpl_id.name + ' Online at Best Price - buildmart'

button.class: btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold w-100 bs-block

div.class: card-cell col-4 col-sm-4 col-md-3 col-lg-2 width-track-50 pad-left-0
card-cell col-6 col-sm-8 col-md-3 col-lg-3 pad-0
card-cell col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-7 pad-0 pro-width-50
card-cell col-4 col-sm-4 col-md-3 col-lg-2 width-track-50 pad-left-0
card-cell col-6 col-sm-8 col-md-3 col-lg-3 pad-0
card-cell col-12 col-sm-12 col-md-6 col-lg-7 pad-0 pro-width-50

li.t-attf-class: fontsize11 latobold#{' completed' if o['current_pick_status'] and o['status_details'].index(o['current_pick_status']) >= o['status_details'].index(os) else ''}

div.div: In case of any changes incurred in your GST registration may affect your orders currently being processed.

div.label: Cancelled Cheque or Bank Statement (which has above details)

div.div: Declaration: I hereby declare that the details furnished above are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and I undertake the responsibility to inform you of any changes therein, immediately.

button.class: btn btn-outline-primary fontsize14 latobold w-100 bs-block

div.t-if: ticket.team_id.allow_portal_ticket_closing and not ticket.stage_id.is_close and not ticket.closed_by_partner

div.p: Are you sure you wish to proceed?

div.t-if: ticket.team_id.allow_portal_ticket_closing and not ticket.stage_id.is_close and not ticket.closed_by_partner

p.small: If the issue has been solved, you can close the request.

template.name: Portal layout : helpdesk tickets menu entries

a.t-att-class: 'btn-block mb8 %s' % ('btn btn-light' if sale_order.transaction_ids else 'btn btn-primary')

p.span: By signing this proposal, I agree to the following terms:
By paying this proposal, I agree to the following terms:

main.div:
No suitable payment option could be found.
If you believe that it is an error, please contact the website administrator.

main.p: Tell us why you are refusing this quotation, this will help us improve our services.

div.t: Your order has been signed but still needs to be paid to be confirmed.

div.div: × Your order is not in a state to be rejected.

div.a: Contact us to get a new quotation.
